document_data.name: ''Mage's Friend''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Mage's Friend''''' was a [[magic]] ring that once belonged to [[L. De Hurst]] of the [[Arcane Tower]] in the [[Underdark]].
document_data.Description: After years of being stored away and disused, the ring became covered in dust and cobwebs.
document_data.Powers: Befitting its original owner, a [[cleric]] of [[Mystra]], the ''Mage's Friend'' granted its wearer insights into arcane knowledge and religious lore.
document_data.History: De Hurst left her ring in a chest in her tower when she left her underground abode for [[Baldur's Gate]] in the {{YearlinkName|1481}}.
